label: https://
detail: Enter a URL for web automation.
documentation: eg. https://google.com

label: http://
detail: Enter a URL for web automation.
documentation: eg. http://google.com

label: click
detail: Clicks an element, or at (x, y) coordinates.
documentation:
click [identifier] eg. click search
click (x, y) eg. click (500, 300)

label: rclick
detail: Right-clicks an element, or at (x, y) coordinates.
documentation:
rclick [identifier] eg. rclick search
rclick (x, y) eg. rclick (500, 300)

label: dclick
detail: Double-clicks an element, or at (x, y) coordinates.
documentation:
dclick [identifier] eg. dclick search
dclick (x, y) eg. dclick (500, 300)

label: hover
detail: Hovers over an element, or at (x, y) coordinates.
documentation:
hover [identifier] eg. hover search
hover (x, y) eg. hover (500, 300)

label: type
detail: Types text into an input.
documentation: type [identifier] as [text] eg. type search-box as search-term

label: select
detail: Selects an option in a select input.
documentation: select [identifier] as [option value] eg. select //select[1] as volvo

label: read
detail: Gets text from an element.
documentation: read [identifier] to [variable] eg. read header as header-text

label: show
detail: Shows an element's text on the console output.
documentation: show [identifier] eg. show header

label: save
detail: Saves an element's text to a file.
documentation: save [identifier] to [filename] eg. save header to info.txt

label: snap
detail: Saves a screenshot of an element to a file.
documentation: snap [identifier] to [filename] eg. snap header to info.txt

label: load
detail: Loads a file as text into a variable.
documentation: load [filename] to [variable] eg. load search.txt to search-term

label: echo
detail: Shows text on the console output.
documentation: echo [text] eg. echo "Welcome to TagUI " name

label: dump
detail: Saves text to a file.
documentation: dump [text] to [filename] eg. dump page-text to page-text.txt

label: write
detail: Appends text to a file.
documentation: write [text] to [filename] eg. write page-text to page-text.txt

label: ask
detail: Gets text input from the user and stores the result in `ask_result`.
documentation: ask [prompt] eg. ask What is the customer's name?

label: live
detail: Enters live mode, where commands can be entered interactively. Recommended for writing scripts.
documentation: live

label: tagui
detail: Runs another TagUI script.
documentation: tagui [filename] eg. tagui ./process-result

label: keyboard
detail: Simulates keystroke presses. Useful for interacting with desktop applications with Tab and other keys.
documentation: keyboard

label: mouse
detail: Enters live mode, where commands can be entered interactively. Recommended for writing scripts.
documentation:
mouse [down/up] eg. mouse down
eg. mouse up
